overview:
Entrepreneur building products to improve every day life.

Co-Founder and Chief Product Officer of BlockBeacon creating a platform for local businesses and consumers to communicate at the neighborhood level. Formerly Director of Products at Sprint Nextel/Virgin Mobile/Helio. Lead the product development team responsible for LBS, SMS, MMS, Email, Web, Address Book, and Search products. Prior to Helio, Patel was a product manager for Yahoo!’s mobile Mail, IM, and Search products globally. Patel has a management consulting background and degree in Electrical Engineering from the University of Michigan.
